description: Explore a single Windows machine's primary metrics.

targets.expr: avg((sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", instance="$server"}) by (instance) * 100)

100 * sum by(instance, process, process_id) (rate(windows_process_cpu_time_total{instance="$server", process!="Idle"}[60s]))
 / on(instance) group_left sum by(instance) (rate(windows_cpu_time_total{instance="$server"}[60s])) > .00001

title: Single Windows Node
